long_description: The men's Castelli Entrata Bike Jersey wicks moisture, dries fast and now features new stretch-mesh arm bands that stay perfectly in place with zero irritation. ProSecco 3D fabric keeps you dry with a great fit; full-length zipper maximizes venting options. Microfiber mesh on collar and sleeves excels at ventilating; mesh arm bands have raw-cut edges that don't bind yet stay in place. 3 rear pockets stow your gear. Men's Entrata Bike Jersey features the Castelli scorpion logo on left chest and reflective tabs on the back.
short_description: The men's Castelli Entrata Bike Jersey wicks moisture, dries fast and now features new stretch-mesh arm bands that stay perfectly in place with zero irritation.
